column4: I-75N just prior to Exit 104/Athens Boonesboro
column5: The roadway is down to one lane (right lane open) until further notice due to a collision involving an overturned vehicle.

column4: The ferry is closed until further notice due to high water conditions.
Starts Friday October 8 with first post at 1:00 p.m.
Use added caution if traveling in the area.
